<small>Aramaic form: **<big>[[H6902|קְבַל]]</big>**</small>
 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָבַל‎</span>] **verb Pi\`el** ==receive, take== (late) (Aramaic loan-word (and in Aramaic denominative) [[BDB#Gerber|Gerber]]<sup>32</sup>, compare Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎(לִ)קְבֵיל‎</span> ***in front***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***opposite***, Biblical Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎לָקֳבֵל‎</span> ***before***, Old Aramaic, Palmyrene <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לקבל‎</span> ***over against***, Nabataean ***id., in view of***; also Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לקבל‎</span> ***in view of*** [[BDB#CIS|CIS]]<sup>iv, No. 79, 11. 2. 4. 5. 8</sup>, Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***‡ablu***</u></abbr>, ***encounter***; verbs are: Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קבל‎</span> ***accept***, [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>ZMG xxix (1875), 615</sup>; xxx (1876), 672; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be in front, opposite***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***accept, admit***; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, especially III. 2, ***go to meet, accept***; Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָבַל‎</span> ***accuse***, Pi\`el = Biblical Hebrew; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎קַבֵּל‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***receive***); — ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִבֵּל‎</span> [[Esth.4.4|Esth 4:4]] + ([[Esth.9.27|Esth 9:27]] [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִבְּלוּ‎</span>); 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִבּלוּ‎</span> [[Ezra.8.30|Ezra 8:30]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְקַבְּלֵם‎</span> [[1Chr.12.19|1Chr 12:19]] (18 [[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]]); 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְקַבְּלוּ‎</span> [[2Chr.29.16|2Chr 29:16]]; [[2Chr.29.22|2Chr 29:22]] 1 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְקַבֵל‎</span> [[Job.2.10|Job 2:10]] (twice in verse); ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַבֵּל‎</span> [[Prov.19.20|Prov 19:20]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַבֶּלֿ‎</span> [[1Chr.21.11|1Chr 21:11]] — 

**1.** ***take***, with accusative of thing [[2Chr.29.22|2Chr 29:22]]; [[Ezra.8.30|Ezra 8:30]] accusative omitted [[2Chr.29.16|2Chr 29:16]], + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> reflexive = choose [[1Chr.21.11|1Chr 21:11]] ***receive***, with accusative of person [[1Chr.12.19|1Chr 12:19]] ([[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]] v.[[1Chr.12.18|1Chr 12:18]]). 

**2.** ***accept***, with accusative of thing [[Job.2.10|Job 2:10]] (twice in verse); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוּסָר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ק‎</span> [[Prov.19.20|Prov 19:20]] accusative omitted [[Esth.4.4|Esth 4:4]]. 

**3.** ***accept, assume***, and obligation, followed by clause, [[Esth.9.23|Esth 9:23]], followed by infinitive v[[Esth.9.27|Esth 9:27]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> reflexive). **Hiph\`il** ***Participle*** feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַקְבִּילֹת‎</span> ***shew oppositeness***, i.e. correspond, one to (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span>) another [[Exod.26.5|Exod 26:5]]; [[Exod.36.12|Exod 36:12]] (both [[BDB#P|P]]).
